h2_title: Stone Monkey Boss Fight and Guide
content: Some more projectiles are brought into  here, however. Occasionally, one of the monkeys will pull up a large rock from the ground and throw it at you, or you'll see one prepare to throw an orb of ice followed by an orb of fire at you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Stone_Monkey.md', within the main section titled 'The Stone Monkey', specifically from the subsection 'Stone Monkey Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'Stone Monkey Phase Two'.
The content is as follows:
Some more projectiles are brought into  here, however. Occasionally, one of the monkeys will pull up a large rock from the ground and throw it at you, or you'll see one prepare to throw an orb of ice followed by an orb of fire at you.
